alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida; Otsego; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 4:10AM EST until January 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of around one quarter of an inch. * WHERE...Northern Oneida, Southern Oneida and Otsego counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation types will be highly variable across the area over time and depending on elevation. Highest ice accumulations will be along the southern slopes of the tug Hill Plateau.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
